meanings.definition: A Mexican restaurant specializing in tacos.
meanings.sent1: We decided to try out the new taquerias in town for lunch.
meanings.sent2: On weekends, the taquerias are always packed with customers craving delicious tacos.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke that the taquerias were so good, they made the neighboring burger joint jealous!
meanings.sent4: The taquerias on that street are like hidden gems waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors and savory smells of the taquerias made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'taqueria', referring to multiple Mexican restaurants specializing in tacos.
meanings.sent1: After trying different taquerias, we found our favorite one with the best salsa.
meanings.sent2: During the food festival, we sampled taquerias from various regions of Mexico.
meanings.sent3: It was a challenge to decide which of the taquerias to visit first with so many options available.
meanings.sent4: The taquerias dotted along the street resembled a trail of taco treasures.
meanings.sent5: The taquerias in the city formed a taco paradise for food enthusiasts.
